Snowflake Vigil <<<<<<< HEAD /2016/06/13/2016-06-snowflake-vigil-html/ Mon, 13 Jun 2016 20:27:00 +0000
/2016/06/13/2016-06-snowflake-vigil-html/ ======= http://dev.jessicasmarquis.com/2016/06/13/2016-06-snowflake-vigil-html/ Mon, 13 Jun 2016 20:27:00 +0000
http://dev.jessicasmarquis.com/2016/06/13/2016-06-snowflake-vigil-html/ >>>>>>> minimal Sadness isn’t an easy feeling for us. Anger is easy because it’s in motion. It helps us feel like we’re doing something. But sadness has a purpose – if nothing else, ‘Inside Out’ should have taught us that. Yes, we need to be angry about what happened yesterday in Orlando. I’m pissed like a bee-stung mama bear that anyone would so brutally harm my fellow beloved creations of God, that my LGBTQ brothers & sisters yet again feel victimized.
